pullRequest.title: [Enhancement]Student Questions & Answers: Security Improvements
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de.
 Server: I added multiple integration tests (Spring) related to the features (with a high test coverage)
 Server: I added @PreAuthorize and check the course groups for all new REST Calls (security)
 Server: I implemented the changes with a good performance and prevented too many database calls
 Server: I documented the Java code using JavaDoc style.
 Client: I added multiple integration tests (Jest) related to the features (with a high test coverage)
 Client: I added authorities to all new routes and check the course groups for displaying navigation elements (links, buttons)
 Client: I documented the TypeScript code using JSDoc style.
 Client: I added multiple screenshots/screencasts of my UI changes
 Client: I translated all the newly inserted strings into German and English

Motivation and Context


Follow-up PR to issues discussed in #2156.
Description

Added security checks if the id of the course provided by the url matches the id of the course the question or answer is in.
Steps for Testing


Log in to Artemis
Check that there is a course with exercises and lectures, and questions are enabled.
Check that all functionalities for both questions and answers still work as expected. (https://ls1intum.testquality.com/project/10165/plan/17385/suite/80878/testcase/234270 might help to test all existing functionality)

Test Coverage


StudentQuestionResource.java: 83%
StudentQuestionAnswerResource.java 88%

commit.message: feat: add check to student question resource

feat: add course security check for question answer
fix: adjust creation test
Merge branch 'enhancement/questions-answers/security-ui' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into enhancement/questions-answers/security-ui

nodes.bodyText: seems like a rather critical bugfix
